Module Milestone1
Package app

Class Cart

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.Cart
  • public class Cart
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a shopping cart that holds SalableProducts and their quantities.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Cart()
      Constructs an empty shopping cart.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addToCart​(SalableProduct product, int qty)
      Adds a product with the specified quantity to the cart.
      void clearCart()
      Clears all products from the cart.
      java.util.Map<SalableProduct,​java.lang.Integer> getProducts()
      Gets the products and their quantities in the cart.
      double getTotalPrice()
      Calculates the total price of all products in the cart, considering each product's price and quantity.
      void removeFromCart​(SalableProduct product, int qty)
      Removes the specified quantity of the product from the cart.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cart

        public Cart()
        Constructs an empty shopping cart.

    • Method Detail

      • getProducts

        public java.util.Map<SalableProduct,​java.lang.Integer> getProducts()
        Gets the products and their quantities in the cart.
        Returns:
        A map of SalableProduct to quantity.

      • addToCart

        public void addToCart​(SalableProduct product,
                      int qty)
        Adds a product with the specified quantity to the cart. If the product is already in the cart, increases the quantity.
        Parameters:
        product - The product to add.
        qty - The quantity to add.

      • removeFromCart

        public void removeFromCart​(SalableProduct product,
                           int qty)
        Removes the specified quantity of the product from the cart. If the quantity to remove is greater than or equal to the current quantity, the product is removed entirely from the cart.
        Parameters:
        product - The product to remove.
        qty - The quantity to remove.

      • getTotalPrice

        public double getTotalPrice()
        Calculates the total price of all products in the cart, considering each product's price and quantity.
        Returns:
        The total price of the cart.

      • clearCart

        public void clearCart()
        Clears all products from the cart.
